# The `MachineConstantPool.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file declares the MachineConstantPool class which is an abstract constant pool to keep track of constants referenced by a function. <a href="#details">More...</a>

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineconstantpool">MachineConstantPool</a> class keeps track of constants referenced by a function which must be spilled to memory. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineconstantpool/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

This file declares the MachineConstantPool class which is an abstract constant pool to keep track of constants referenced by a function.

<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The MachineConstantPool class keeps track of constants referenced by a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// function which must be spilled to memory.  This is used for constants which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// are unable to be used directly as operands to instructions, which typically</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// include floating point and large integer constants.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Instructions reference the address of these constant pool constants through</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the use of MO&#95;ConstantPoolIndex values.  When emitting assembly or machine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// code, these virtual address references are converted to refer to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// address of the function constant pool values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The machine constant pool.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineconstantpool"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineconstantpool/#a482792470bfd3d7e4f1581f3c3f4bb14">MachineConstantPool</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> PoolAlignment; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; The alignment for the pool.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;MachineConstantPoolEntry&gt; Constants; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///&lt; The pool of constants.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// MachineConstantPoolValues that use an existing MachineConstantPoolEntry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/denseset">DenseSet&lt;MachineConstantPoolValue&#42;&gt;</a> MachineCPVsSharingEntries;</span></CodeLine>
